box2D.collision.B2DistanceProxy

type
class
A distance proxy is used by the GJK algorithm. It encapsulates any shape.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

m_count : Int

m_radius : Float

m_vertices : Array<box2D.common.math.B2Vec2>

Instance Methods

getSupport(d : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2) : Float

Get the supporting vertex index in the given direction.

getSupportVertex(d : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2) : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get the supporting vertex in the given direction.

getVertex(index : Int) : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get a vertex by index. Used by b2Distance.

getVertexCount() : Int

Get the vertex count.

set(shape : box2D.collision.shapes.B2Shape) : Void

Initialize the proxy using the given shape. The shape must remain in scope while the proxy is in use.
